actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2809 of title 42, United States Code, to provide for the establishment of heat crisis programs during periods of heat emergencies.
short_title: Real Estate Construction and Rehabilitation Tax Incentives Act of 1980

summary.text: Authorizes the Director of the Community Services Administration to implement emergency heat crisis programs for low income and elderly persons during a heat crisis (as defined in this Act). States that: (1) such programs shall include payments for utility bills and cooling devices and for transportation to community shelters with adequate cooling facilities; and (2) funds may be provided only from June 1 through September 30 of any given year.

titles.title: Real Estate Construction and Rehabilitation Tax Incentives Act of 1980
A bill to amend section 2809 of title 42, United States Code, to provide for the establishment of heat crisis programs during periods of heat emergencies.
